testsuite.name: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I enable Privacy Policy Required with the dummy URL
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the Shared Secret page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I check if Consumer Key and Shared Secret exist, if not, I create them
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Instructor" and outcome URL "default" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I am on the Privacy Policy page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And The Accept Privacy Policy button is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: When I accept the Privacy Policy
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: When I click the 'New Class' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I create new class with random name
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: When I click the 'New Assignment' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I create empty assignment with random name
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: When I click the 'Assignment' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I am on the Assignment Review Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: When I go to the LTI Test Harness page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I restore the launched LTI Test Harness form
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I update LTI user fields
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I launch prepared "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Student" and outcome URL "default" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I am on the Privacy Policy page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And The Accept Privacy Policy button is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: When I accept the Privacy Policy
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I am on the Assignment Review Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then I directly log out
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Given I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I set Privacy Policy Required to false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I set the Privacy Policy URL to ""
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.name: And The Privacy Policy Required is false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Privacy policy with Assignment LTI launch.
